content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the Nazi party’s ideal role for “Aryan” women in Germany?

choices.label: They were to be mothers, wives, and homemakers.
They were to serve in equal numbers with men in state and party bureaucracies at all levels.
They were to enjoy economic power equal to that of men.
They were to have no political or legal rights.
They would be a reserve military force, available for frontline duty when there was a shortage of male soldiers.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
